attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Ryan's law would mean that the crime of manslaughter could not be applied if the person charged used any type of weapon.
If a weapon is used the culprit intended serious harm and so the charge should be murder!
People responsibe for such crimes should be punished with a life sentance, getting rid of the manslaughter charge for a crime using a weapon would be the first place to start!

rejection.details: Please make your title a comprehensible call for action
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
